Your art is fueled by the pathos that comes with seeing even the mightiest champions brought low by doubt and ill fate. Whenever a creature you can see within 60ft of you is hit by a natural 20 on an attack roll, rolls a natural 1 on a save check, or when one of your allies fails a death throw, gain 1 @Compendium[undertaking-homebrew.abilities.ZVH8L715PTWTQLSE]{✨ Flair} point.
    You can only benefit from one Theme ability at a time. If you have multiple Theme abilities, you can change which one is active when you finish a short or long rest and any time you spend a @Compendium[undertaking-homebrew.abilities.ZVH8L715PTWTQLSE]{✨ Flair} point on an ability.
